detailsData.title: In-Depth Consultation
detailsData.content: At EHG Law, we take the time to connect with clients in-person and address their individual concerns from the get-go. We engage in a lengthy and meaningful discussion about your case and explain the various implications of pending criminal charges.

detailsData.title: Constant Communication
detailsData.content: Clients have direct access to Erin as the primary point of contact; no secretary or answering service to go through first. We pride ourselves on responding quickly to our clients’ concerns and questions to ease the burden and anxiety.

detailsData.title: Straightforward Strategy
detailsData.content: We don’t just work to 'solve a problem,' we work to impact a life. We provide prompt updates that include straightforward explanations of what has happened in your case, and spend the time to make sure you understand all of the information necessary.

detailsData.title: Personalized Legal Solutions
detailsData.content: When you’re faced with the critical decisions about your case, you want a team who is deeply committed to your goals and priorities. Engaging an attorney that truly cares about the outcome of the case is just as important as one that maintains clear communication.

address: 675 Ponce de Leon Ave NE #8500, Atlanta GA 30308
